data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Shivpuri to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shivpuri, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Shivpuri.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Shivpuri.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Shivpuri, Madhya Pradesh, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Alwar people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Shivpuri, Madhya Pradesh, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Shivpuri, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the county of Shivpuri, Madhya Pradesh, India has a population of 1,726,100.

We estimate Shivpuri has 18,987 people who might know Jesus, 20,943 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,686,170 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Shivpuri, Madhya Pradesh, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
